title: Climb with Thresh
body:
It's fucking freelo. Abuse Thresh as support before Riot figures out that he literally has zero shortcomings.

Is there a match-up he can't win? No.

Is his Q the most aptly-named skill in the game? Yes.

Is his E anti-escape, anti-initiate, a slow and high damage? Yes.

Is his W just the biggest get-out-of-jail free card ever? Yes.

Is his R ridiculously OP? Yes.

Can his kit do everything and anything? Yes.

Perfect champion. Abuse him.

replies.body: Thresh does nothing by himself and is only as good as the person playing him what are you talking about?

He has a stun, slow, disengage, engage, bail-out, zone control, damage and scales infinitely.

He's absurd. Trust me. I've been abusing the shit out of him.
